reviews.title: D&D Perfection
reviews.content: Baldur's Gate 3 is the perfect D&D video game. The turn-based combat is strategic and engaging, the story is compelling, and the choices truly matter. Larian has created something extraordinary.

reviews.title: RPG of the Generation
reviews.content: This game redefines what an RPG can be. The depth of choice, the quality of writing, and the attention to detail are unmatched. Every playthrough feels unique and meaningful.

reviews.title: Excellent with Minor Issues
reviews.content: The game is incredible, but Act 3 has some performance issues and bugs. The story and gameplay are top-notch, making this one of the best RPGs ever made despite the technical problems.

reviews.title: CRPG Renaissance
reviews.content: This is the game that will bring CRPGs back to the mainstream. The production values are incredible, the voice acting is superb, and the gameplay is accessible yet deep. A masterpiece.

reviews.title: Fantasy RPG Perfection
reviews.content: Baldur's Gate 3 captures the magic of tabletop D&D perfectly. The companions are memorable, the world is rich, and the combat is strategic. This is what RPGs should aspire to be.
